alert.note: Alert for Benton (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 2:46PM PST until December 21 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Marys River near Philomath affecting Benton County. For the Willamette River Tributaries...including Philomath...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Marys River near Philomath. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...Above 20.0 feet, expect widespread low land and agricultural flooding. Numerous roads along the Marys are affected, and some structures near the river may begin to flood. Expect river flooding in south Corvallis as well as parts of Hwy 99W, as well as parts of south Philomath. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM PST Monday the stage was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected hold steady near 20.9 ft this evening, then slowly recede overnight. River is expected to drop below flood stage between 6 5 and 7 am Tuesday. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 6 AM PST Tuesday.
